sentence: Our room was unremarkable in that it is a typical Sheraton room but comfortable and very clean and the television and furnishings were in good condition
My room was comfortable but nothing special
The room was fine nice comfortable bed clean but a very small bathroom
The room was clean very comfortable and quiet
The room was vey nice and spotless and had a great view and the bed was VERY comfortable

Only a few blocks from the Franklin Institution we were only 10 minutes cab ride away from the cool historic sites of Philadelphia The room was big enough for 3 people clean comfortable beds big bathroom however the shower pressure was weak
Add free wifi mini fridges and a coffee maker in the room and I would have given it 5 stars
Comfortable spacious rooms decent bathroom I am not sure if I was in a renovated room or not
Very clean rooms comfortable beds
Beautiful view of Ben Franklin Parkway and Museums
Ranita the front desk attendant was very helpful after we made her aware of the stains on the sheets and the fact the TV were not working
You do not have your lunch in a bathroom why should my baby eat there
All travelers now a days assume that if you pay for a hotel room in 3 4 5 star hotel you get wifi
Then the rooms were not anything special and had no extra features
I had adjourning rooms one for the kids the other for my sister and I Five people in total when the max compasity is 4 per room
The bed was comfortable enough but certainly not the best and not as good as the beds at most Courtyards
I went to the front desk and they were able to move us after 120 to a different room
pictures are much nicer than what the rooms are in person
Lastly I loved that I had a room at the end of the hall but my neighbors were just planned loud
We complained and a manager got involved and we were begrudgingly booked into another room
I know the Fitness center is under renovation but the equipment was dirty and the room with the cardiovascular equipment was too hot
Our room did n’t have a fridge but we were offered one very ugly one
Second I would have loved to have a small fridge in the room for beverages and snacks
so on my engagement weekend when all i wanted to do was spend time with my fiancé in the room i have to go elsewhere to wait for maintenance to fix it
Refrigerator needed in room my spouse thinks bed too low and pillows uncomfortable
I strongly recommend to any out of towners or phily residents if you want great service and excellent rooms stay at the Philadelphia 201 Hotel for sure

The rooms are mediocre cleanliness is subpar the food was horrendous and the icing on the cake was that they ran out of hot water 2 days in a row here for a 3rd night so it will probably run out again in the morning
There was NO hot water both times we took a shower and the the bed was uncomfortable
The only thing that I would request would be to have a refrigerator in my room
It was freezing in Phily and we had the heat in our room up to 80 degrees
